name: The Outhouse
description:
THE OUTHOUSE IS A FAST PACED 2 PLAYERS ACTION GAME WHERE YOU CONTROL UFOS WHO MUST VALUE TOILET PAPER BY DEFENDING THE OUTHOUSE AGAINST VANDALS, SQUATTERS, BOMBERS, G.I JOES, DRONES, METEORS, BATS, EVEN THE UNTHINKABLE!

  GAMEPLAY VIDEO:

  FEATURING:
* SEMI-GRAPHICS 4 AESTHETICS
  DRAGONS AND COCOS REJOICE!  (mc-10 too)
* 6809 STYLED SOUND EFFECTS AND TUNE.
* 15 CHALLENGING WAVES.
* 3 BOSSES.
* 7 ENEMIES, SOME, EVEN OF EACH OTHER!
* SUPER HIGH RESOLUTION PRINT
  EXPLODED TECH ILLUSTRATION
  OF A COLOR COMPUTER 2! 

BASED ON THE SUPERBLY ORIGINAL TRS-80 GAME BY J. WEAVER JR.

WHAT? HOW:
https://sites.google.com/view/fuedhq/the_outhouse?authuser=0

  SOME INSTRUCTIONS:
* UNZIP AND RUN THE .EXE
* ARROWS+Z OR ANY JOYPAD + A
* F1 - FOR SG GRID OVERLAY
* F4 - FULL SCREEN
* ESC - QUIT
---
POWERED BY GLBASIC, CHECK:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/819510/GLBasic_SDK/
